attributes.action: Mandatory child safety advertisements on childrens television channels
attributes.additional_details:
I petition that all channels which exclusively cater to the entertainment of children should be required to show one safety advertisement aimed at children per hour, at the very least.

With the growing number of child-centric channels on television there is a distinct possibility that many children would miss the rare occasion any such advertisements were broadcast.

By having mandatory requirements to show such informative media, the potential to reach these children would increase massively.
